Baan Dusit Pattaya, House 105/33, House 105/34, House 105/38

3 beautiful Guest Houses
for work and living traveling style

The area is the finest in Pattaya and very close to Ramayana waterpark and all the attractions and places of amusement.


Exclusive lakeside Living. "Enjoy life on the lake in cool summer breezes all year round"


Every detail managed with attention and care. We do not just build houses, we create homes and communities.

About Guest Houses

Our guest houses are perfectly equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay.


Spacious living rooms, comfortable bedrooms, a beautiful courtyard all this awaits you in our homes. The space of houses will be comfortable both for a long stay and for a short visit for several days.


We offer you a cozy atmosphere and a pleasant welcome and are waiting for you to visit us!

Guest House Features

Beautiful landscapes and view
Pleasant and private courtyard
Comfortable and spacious layout
Big and cozy pools
Pleasant and comfortable bedrooms
Nice interiors and design
Full apartment equipment
Private parking places

About location

Exclusive lakeside Living.


"Enjoy life on the lake in cool summer breezes all year round"


Every detail managed with attention and care. We do not just build houses, we create homes and communities.


Conveniently located community Baan Dusit Pattaya Lake is only 2 kilometers from Sukhumvit Road in Pattaya, near the beach, golf courses, department store, hospital, and school.

Choose apartment
